comment: при успешной проверке можно облутать когитаторы

languages.text: Древние когитаторы давно мертвы. Несмотря на это, кожухи машин остались целыми — внутренние детали вряд ли были разрушены стихией и могут быть пригодны для дела.

traits.locale_text: Не рабочие, но вполне целые когитаторы древности. Их детали до сих пор ценятся по всему Империуму.

languages.text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.
languages.original_text: Древние когитаторы давно мертвы. Несмотря на это, кожухи машин остались целыми — внутренние детали вряд ли были разрушены стихией и могут быть пригодны для дела.

traits.locale_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

languages.text: 这些古老的沉思者早已死亡。尽管如此，沉思者的盖子依然完好无损，内部零件看起来也似乎并没有被损坏。或许这些沉思者依然能派得上用场。
languages.original_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

traits.locale_text: 这些古老的思考器早已死亡。尽管如此，思考器的盖子依然完好无损，内部零件看起来也似乎并没有被损坏。或许这些思考器依然能派得上用场。

languages.text: Estos cogitadores antiguos murieron hace mucho tiempo. Pese a ello, las tapas de las máquinas siguen intactas. Es probable que las piezas interiores, protegidas de los elementos, sigan sirviendo para algo.
languages.original_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

traits.locale_text: Estos cogitadores antiguos murieron hace mucho tiempo. Pese a ello, las tapas de las máquinas siguen intactas. Es probable que las piezas interiores, protegidas de los elementos, sigan sirviendo para algo.

languages.text: ここにある古代の考算機はとうの昔に死滅したにもかかわらず、機械のカバーはまだ無傷だ。内部の部品が風雨で損なわれた可能性は低く、まだ使える可能性がある。
languages.original_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

traits.locale_text: ここにある古代の考算機はとうの昔に死滅したにもかかわらず、機械のカバーはまだ無傷だ。内部の部品が風雨で損なわれた可能性は低く、まだ使える可能性がある。

languages.text: Diese uralten Cogitatoren sind längst tot. Trotzdem sind die Abdeckungen der Maschinen noch intakt – es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass die Teile im Inneren von den Elementen zerstört wurden, sie könnten also noch nützlich sein.
languages.original_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

traits.locale_text: Diese uralten Cogitatoren sind längst tot. Trotzdem sind die Abdeckungen der Maschinen noch intakt – es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass die Teile im Inneren von den Elementen zerstört wurden, sie könnten also noch nützlich sein.

languages.text: Ces vieux cogitateurs sont hors service depuis longtemps. Malgré cela, les enveloppes des machines sont encore intactes. Il semble peu probable que les composants internes aient été endommagés par les éléments, et ils pourraient s'avérer utiles.
languages.original_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.

traits.locale_text: Ces vieux cogitateurs sont hors service depuis longtemps. Malgré cela, les enveloppes des machines sont encore intactes. Il semble peu probable que les composants internes aient été endommagés par les éléments, et ils pourraient s'avérer utiles.

languages.text: Bu antik kavramsayarlar öleli çok olmuş. Buna rağmen makinelerin kapakları hâlâ sapasağlam duruyor... Kavramsayarların içindeki parçaların doğa şartlarından harap olması pek muhtemel durmuyor, yani hâlâ işe yarayabilirler.
languages.original_text: These ancient cogitators are long dead. Despite this, the covers of the machines are still intact — it seems unlikely that the inner parts were ruined by the elements, so they could still prove useful.
